options.name: upcoming
options.description: Lists the next X upcoming events

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of upcoming events to see. range: 1-15. Defaults to 1

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar to pull the events from. Defaults to 1

options.description: Lists the events in the specified range
